summary: This is an email from March 13, 2020, sharing a draft factual statement and advocating for a non-prosecution (non-pros) disposition for an unnamed female associate of Jeffrey Epstein. The sender argues she was a vulnerable victim acting under Epstein's direction.

events.title: Submission of draft factual statement
events.description: An email is sent sharing a draft factual statement regarding an unnamed female associate of Jeffrey Epstein, arguing for a non-prosecution disposition.

keyFacts: A draft factual statement was submitted on March 13, 2020, regarding a female associate of Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender argues the associate was a 'cog in Epstein's wheel', acting entirely at his direction.
The sender claims the associate was herself a 'very vulnerable victim' at the time of her actions.
The proposed legal disposition is a non-prosecution (non-pros).
The email originates from or is related to a Google Docs share notification.
